verses.name: Psalms 135:1
verses.text: Alleluja.   Confitemini Domino, quoniam bonus,  quoniam in æternum misericordia ejus.

verses.name: Psalms 135:2
verses.text: Confitemini Deo deorum,  quoniam in æternum misericordia ejus.

verses.name: Psalms 135:3
verses.text: Confitemini Domino dominorum,  quoniam in æternum misericordia ejus.

verses.name: Psalms 135:4
verses.text: Qui facit mirabilia magna solus,  quoniam in æternum misericordia ejus.

verses.name: Psalms 135:5
verses.text: Qui fecit cælos in intellectu,  quoniam in æternum misericordia ejus.

verses.name: Psalms 135:6
verses.text: Qui firmavit terram super aquas,  quoniam in æternum misericordia ejus.

verses.name: Psalms 135:7
verses.text: Qui fecit luminaria magna,  quoniam in æternum misericordia ejus :

verses.name: Psalms 135:8
verses.text: solem in potestatem diei,  quoniam in æternum misericordia ejus ;

verses.name: Psalms 135:9
verses.text: lunam et stellas in potestatem noctis,  quoniam in æternum misericordia ejus.

verses.name: Psalms 135:10
verses.text: Qui percussit Ægyptum cum primogenitis eorum,  quoniam in æternum misericordia ejus.

verses.name: Psalms 135:11
verses.text: Qui eduxit Israël de medio eorum,  quoniam in æternum misericordia ejus,

verses.name: Psalms 135:12
verses.text: in manu potenti et brachio excelso,  quoniam in æternum misericordia ejus.

verses.name: Psalms 135:13
verses.text: Qui divisit mare Rubrum in divisiones,  quoniam in æternum misericordia ejus ;

verses.name: Psalms 135:14
verses.text: et eduxit Israël per medium ejus,  quoniam in æternum misericordia ejus ;

verses.name: Psalms 135:15
verses.text: et excussit Pharaonem et virtutem ejus in mari Rubro,  quoniam in æternum misericordia ejus.

verses.name: Psalms 135:16
verses.text: Qui traduxit populum suum per desertum,  quoniam in æternum misericordia ejus.

verses.name: Psalms 135:17
verses.text: Qui percussit reges magnos,  quoniam in æternum misericordia ejus ;

verses.name: Psalms 135:18
verses.text: et occidit reges fortes,  quoniam in æternum misericordia ejus :

verses.name: Psalms 135:19
verses.text: Sehon, regem Amorrhæorum,  quoniam in æternum misericordia ejus ;

verses.name: Psalms 135:20
verses.text: et Og, regem Basan,  quoniam in æternum misericordia ejus :

verses.name: Psalms 135:21
verses.text: et dedit terram eorum hæreditatem,  quoniam in æternum misericordia ejus ;

verses.name: Psalms 135:22
verses.text: hæreditatem Israël, servo suo,  quoniam in æternum misericordia ejus.

verses.name: Psalms 135:23
verses.text: Quia in humilitate nostra memor fuit nostri,  quoniam in æternum misericordia ejus ;

verses.name: Psalms 135:24
verses.text: et redemit nos ab inimicis nostris,  quoniam in æternum misericordia ejus.

verses.name: Psalms 135:25
verses.text: Qui dat escam omni carni,  quoniam in æternum misericordia ejus.

verses.name: Psalms 135:26
verses.text: Confitemini Deo cæli,  quoniam in æternum misericordia ejus.  Confitemini Domino dominorum,  quoniam in æternum misericordia ejus.
